responses.rationale: The segment reports a negative fact (deaths) but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk evaluation.
The segment reports an action (culling) but contains no explicit calming language or intensified low-risk evaluation.
Uses 'rare' but lacks an intensifier ('very rare', 'extremely low risk') required for the intensified low-risk pattern.
Reports a positive fact ('no record of Americans') but lacks explicit calming language or intensified low-risk evaluation.
